text: @NYGovCuomo This Governor is a disgrace for one reason: Matilda Cuomo is not yet in a nursing home. Many of us will be someday - can you imagine his policy had she been there? He flooded the homes with Coronavirus patients when he had the SS Hope AND Javits Center. Unconscionable!
